website_summaries.verdict: Focal may be new to the headphone market, but its Spirit One is an auspicious debut with the look, feel, and sound of a winner.
pros: The Focal Spirit One combines sleek styling and vivid sound quality in a relatively small circumaural, over-the-ear headphone design
cons: Comfort is good, but not great

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones – but buy new
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these headphones are great for their price, but make sure you buy them new. I bought a used pair and received a pair that had a crinkle in the diaphragm. Because Focal has designed the diaphragms of these headphones to be relatively hard, any damage to them is irreversible. There was a noticeable crinkling sound (imagine someone crinkling a candy wrapper) with the volume only turned halfway up. That's the risk you take buying used, I suppose. I now own the Focal Spirit Professionals, which are excellent – these headphones are quite good for their price, but I'd recommend buying new just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend. Right side driver has failed after 3 or ...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot recommend. Right side driver has failed after 3 or 4 uses over the past 3 years. Evidently the manufacturer had parts problems when these were created, the headphones have been redesigned as Spirit One "S". Avoid these at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: TechGeek

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: I too have held off on writing this review, primarily because of problems I had with my first two pairs. The first was purchased in December, 2012. There was clearly something wrong with the sound. No base or clarity whatsoever. I exchanged them for another pair that developed a rattling on the left side within a couple of weeks. These were replaced in February. I have had no issues with the current headphones and I have been enjoying absolutely incredible sound. It is open, distinct, and entirely immersive. While it has been a journey, i am completely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: john kendall

customer_reviews.title: Sound almost as good as they look
customer_reviews.text: The Focal Spirit Ones look the business and sound pretty good too. I'd say they're not quite as good as the NAD HP50s in terms of their ability to handle a lot of types of sound simultaneously, and they don't sound quite as "open," but they do have slightly punchier bass and do a good job reproducing music accurately and with a slight injection of fun. Would recommend to a traveler.
customer_reviews.author: NL-G

customer_reviews.title: [ MAGIC ]
customer_reviews.text: Recommended seller. No one can deny the sound quality of Focal. It's a magic. It hipnotized me with clear, detail and proportional sound. I can hear more music with this. But sorry, I can give only 5 stars, can't give more. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: heston ash shiddiqie

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones under 300 dollars I have heard
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones. Deep rich bass, a strong midrange and quick treble, sound great for slow electronic songs. I highly recommend listening to James Blake's 'Limit to Your Love', the headphones do an amazing job recreating the quick deep bass along with Blake's powerful voice and rythmic beat. They also do a great job isolalating sound.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying the beets
customer_reviews.text: Better off buying the beets! First pair I received was damaged right out the box. Sounded like the left earphone was busted. They exchanged them but a big pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: "DIY" Chris

customer_reviews.title: If you like being accused of having stolen goods then this retailer ...
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged. Rattling in right earphone. I called the Focal warranty people who said that this is not an authorized dealer and that they are quite possibly stole merchandise. If you like being accused of having stolen goods then this retailer is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Sandon Coggin

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: A finely built, compact and useful headphone, since it have a built in microphone. I don't need to say a lot about how it sounds, just read the reviews out there. For my untrained ears, I found it lacking only some better highs, but the lows are impressive! A good deal, specially if you buy it with the $85 discount.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor manufacturing quality. Got two and both came broken from the factory. First pair has offcenter balance. the second one has a broken speaker. Returned both.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Well made and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Price was right, has 2 cables so I can work with xm and my iPhone.Don't know if I would pay full price
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Mills

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The right channel went dead after 40 days. That is unacceptable for 280 dollar headphones. Now the 30 day amazon return window just expired and I am stuck with these headphones. I have to go through the whole warranty and replacement process and I doubt the next set will be more durable. I read numerous reviews on the internet from audio and electronic sites. Unfortunately their reviews very rarely test the durability of a product. The durability of a product is tested by the same consumers which takes some time. Too bad I rushed into buying this set of headphones which have not been on the market for that long.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Crisp sounds.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas. Very comfortable, very crisp sounds. The details of all the instruments, and other components that make up a song, really stand out. Makes us enjoy listening to our favorite songs even more.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Focal Spirit One - Problem
customer_reviews.text: After one month with the Focal Spirit One headphones there is a buzzing sound from the left side. The sound is heard in the low frequencies during the play of bass related sounds. I really like the headphones enjoyed the clean audiophile sound until experiencing the distracting / irritating buzz. Now I'm at lost. The headphones were purchased in the USA (7 June 2012) during my vacation or home leave. I hand carried the headphones on my return trip to work in Indonesia. I want to return for repair or replacement. This will be another experience, I'm sure. Terre
customer_reviews.author: Terre

customer_reviews.title: Be aware!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second headphone from Focal. I am a Focal fan...however, having loud buzz on left side as many others mentioned is not fun at all..... First one had buzzing sound as soon as I tried the headphone.... Second one didn't buzz for 4 days.....but it started buzzing again..... BEFORE second set had problem, the sound was a bit tinny, but the sound was very precise, sharp, and spacious....They are very good for Jazz and Electronicas....the voise is a bit shallow sometimes..... I assume they release second release from factory in China (Yuk!!!!)....because Apple stores, and other Hi-Fi shops didn't have them in stock.....perhaps Focal recalled the products....
customer_reviews.author: iloowa

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sounding headphones. They seem well made BUT they break and become a $280 paper weight. Don't trust them.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cans
customer_reviews.text: I've read the reviews, the negative targeted toward quality control rather than performance. I'm an audiophile with several high end 2 channel systems. This is a very good set of cans. Dynamic, open, detailed and balanced. I've experienced no problems with my pair. They been used in systems ranging from an iPod Classic to my main system using a Sugden class A headphone amplifier fed by a Rega transport and EVS DAC. I've owned Stax, Beyerdynamic, AKG, Sennheiser 650 to name a few. For the money, a very decent price/performance product.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R. Barker

customer_reviews.title: not good value for money
customer_reviews.text: there are better headphones on the market for the price! despite a cool designer look and a well balanced output throughout the frequency range the product does not stand up if compared with competitors. The construction is cheap (I had to reglue bits that were comig apart just after a few hours of use). The fit is uncomfortable, the padding is quite rigid. It could have used a bit larger and softer earpads. 3 stars is for looks and sound quality. fit and quality of materials would score 2/5 in my books.
customer_reviews.author: P. Marzinotto

customer_reviews.title: Best headphone on the market
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinary sound by far the best of the best audio manufacturer of high end car domestic and commercial equipment available.
customer_reviews.author: brent koppen

product_meta.title: Focal 529102-SPOH Spirit One Headphones
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingDesigned for the discriminating listener who demands the finest personal sound experience possible; Focal's new Spirit One headphone combines space age materials, 32-years of acoustic industry leadership, and a dash of French design flair to create a luxury experience sure to delight your senses. With its aluminum billet "Made for iPhone telephony controls and clear sound microphone capsule located on its acoustically damped modular signal cable, you'll hear perfect telephone conversations from both cups, as well as world class musical fidelity thanks to 40mm sculpted mylar-titanium driver elements. Sold with an attractive hard case, cloth bag and a full compliment of accessories, and backed by a two-year parts and labor warranty, your Spirit One will become your trusted travel companion for years to come. Listening to your music everywhere in your everyday environment, it's now possible. Focal-JMlab has the solution to bring a quality sound in any room in your home (living-room, bedroom, Hall, kitchen etc.), in your garden, in your car or in your professional studio. Innovation is pushing the envelope. Focal permanently invents new solutions to integrate a hifi quality sound whatever the conditions, in-wall, on-wall or in-ceiling loudspeakers. And everything becomes possible. Since 1979, Focal-JMlab is one of the world leaders of the High End acoustic loudspeakers. 30 years to fight our values, to keep our production in France and to stand up for the idea of a luxury à la française. Innovation, tradition, be the world's best in everything we create for your pleasure, that's Focal philosophy; the Spirit of Sound.
feature_bullets: Modular Single sided, acoustically damped signal cable with integrated microphone & made for iPhone, iPod, iPad controls.
Comfort-Fit Aluminum Framed Pentagraph Headband Design with Gimbaled Earcups.
Fully Accessorized (Hard Case, Travel bag, Airplane Adaptor, 1/8 to 1/4 Jack Adaptor) .

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars54 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
